name: Системный аналитик
description:
Привет! Сейчас мы ищем в нашу команду Системного аналитика.

ЧЕМ ПРЕДСТОИТ ЗАНИМАТЬСЯ:
  • Сбор требований к программному продукту, проведение интервью с заказчиком
  • Анализ бизнес-требований, проектирование схем бизнес-процессов
  • Подготовка и согласование функциональных требований к ИС
  • Разработка, ведение и анализ технической документации (ТЗ)
  • Взаимодействие с ИТ командой на этапе разработки программного продукта
  • Участие в тестировании программного продукта
  • Участие в приемо-сдаточных испытаниях внедряемого функционала разработанной системы
  • Демонстрация готового продукта и обучение пользователей

НАШ ИДЕАЛЬНЫЙ КАНДИДАТ:

  • Знает типовые нотации BPMN и UML
  • Имеет опыт в интеграциях
  • Знает базы данных и их проектирование, в первую очередь SQL
branded_description:
<style>
@charset "UTF-8";

.tmpl_hh_wrapper img {
    width: 100%;
    display: block;
    -webkit-user-select: none;
    -moz-user-select: none;
    -ms-user-select: none;

}

.tmpl_hh_wrapper * {

    box-sizing: border-box;
}

.tmpl_hh_wrapper [role=button] {

}

.tmpl_hh_wrapper p,

.tmpl_hh_wrapper img,

.tmpl_hh_wrapper li {
    margin: 0;

    vertical-align: baseline;
}

.hht-vacancydescription {
    padding: 0px;
}

.tmpl_hh_wrapper .l-cell,

    padding: 0px !important;
}

.tmpl_hh_wrapper .b-vacancy-desc-wrapper {

}

.tmpl_hh_wrapper .b-vacancy-desc {
    overflow: visible !important;

}

.tmpl_hh_content li em {
    font-size: inherit !important;
    color: inherit !important;
    margin: 0 !important;
    text-transform: none;
    display: inline;
    background: transparent;
}

.tmpl_hh_content li strong {
    font-weight: bold;
}

.tmpl_hh_content li em {
    font-weight: normal;
    font-style: italic;
}

.tmpl_hh_content li p {
    font-size: inherit !important;
    margin: 0;
}

.tmpl_hh_content>strong,
.tmpl_hh_content div>strong {
    display: inline-block;
}

.tmpl_hh_content p strong {
    margin: 0;
}

.tmpl_hh_content p:first-child,
.tmpl_hh_content>strong:first-child,
.tmpl_hh_content div>strong:first-child {
    margin-top: 0 !important;
}

.tmpl_hh_wrapper {
    width: 100%;
    margin: 40px auto;
    max-width: 690px;
    position: relative;
    word-break: normal;
    font-family: "Arial", sans-serif;
    color: #000;
    background-color: #ebebeb;
    border-radius: 40px;
    font-size: 16px;
    line-height: 1.3;
    overflow: hidden;
    -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
}

.tmpl_hh_container {
    background-color: #ebebeb;
    border-radius: 40px;
}

.tmpl_hh_video {
    position: relative;
    width: 100%;
}

.tmpl_hh_video img,
.tmpl_hh_video iframe {
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    top: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
}

.tmpl_hh_content {
    margin-top: 32px;
    margin-bottom: 50px;
    padding: 30px 32px;
}

.tmpl_hh_content p,
.tmpl_hh_content>strong,
.tmpl_hh_content div>strong {
    margin: 16px 0 11px;
}

.tmpl_hh_content strong {
    margin: 30px 0 11px;
    font-size: 18px;
    line-height: 1;
    font-weight: 700;
}

.tmpl_hh_content ol,
.tmpl_hh_content ul {
    margin-left: 27px;
    padding-bottom: 1px;
    list-style: none !important;
}

.tmpl_hh_content ol {
    counter-reset: list_counter;
}

.tmpl_hh_content li {
    position: relative;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
}

.tmpl_hh_content ul ul,
.tmpl_hh_content ul ol,
.tmpl_hh_content ol ol,
.tmpl_hh_content ol ul {
    margin-top: 10px;
}

.tmpl_hh_content ol>li {
    counter-increment: list_counter;
}

.tmpl_hh_content li:before {
    content: "";
    position: absolute;
    left: -20px;
    top: 0;
}

.tmpl_hh_content ul>li:before {
    content: "•";
}

.tmpl_hh_content ol>li:before {
    content: counter(list_counter) ".";
}

.tmpl_hh_head {
    position: relative;
    margin-bottom: 39px;
}

.tmpl_hh_head_title {
    position: relative;
    margin-left: 33.2%;
}

.tmpl_hh_head_title::before {

}

img.tmpl_hh_head_title_image {

}

}

p.tmpl_hh_head_text {

    padding-right: 36px;

}

.tmpl_hh_benefits {
    margin-bottom: 60px;

}

}

.tmpl_hh_benefits_cards {
    display: -webkit-box;
    display: -ms-flexbox;
    display: flex;
    -ms-flex-wrap: wrap;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    -webkit-box-align: center;
    -ms-flex-align: center;
    align-items: center;
    -webkit-box-pack: start;
    -ms-flex-pack: start;
    justify-content: start;
    gap: 9px 10px;
}

.tmpl_hh_benefits_card {
    display: -webkit-box;
    display: -ms-flexbox;
    display: flex;
    -ms-flex-wrap: wrap;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    -webkit-box-align: start;
    -ms-flex-align: start;
    align-items: start;
    -webkit-box-pack: start;
    -ms-flex-pack: start;
    justify-content: start;

}

.tmpl_hh_benefits_card p {

}

.tmpl_hh_benefits_card--orange p {
    color: #fff;

}

.tmpl_hh_benefits_card--orange .tmpl_hh_benefits_card_image {

}

.tmpl_hh_benefits_card_image {

}

.tmpl_hh_statistics {
    margin-bottom: 60px;

}

p.tmpl_hh_statistics_title {
    max-width: 257px;

    font-size: 18px;
    font-weight: 700;
    line-height: 1.2;
}

p.tmpl_hh_statistics_title br {
    display: none;
}

.tmpl_hh_statistics_cards {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
    gap: 18px;
}

.tmpl_hh_statistics_card:nth-child(3) {
    padding-left: 20px;
}

p.tmpl_hh_statistics_card_title {
    position: relative;

}

p.tmpl_hh_statistics_text {

}

    padding-inline: 8px;
}

}

.tmpl_hh_office_cards {
    position: relative;
    display: -webkit-box;
    display: -ms-flexbox;
    display: flex;
    -webkit-box-orient: horizontal;
    -webkit-box-direction: normal;
    -ms-flex-direction: row;

}

.tmpl_hh_office_cards::after {
    content: "";
    position: absolute;
    top: -40px;
    right: 121px;
    width: 100px;

}

.tmpl_hh_office_column {
    display: -webkit-box;
    display: -ms-flexbox;
    display: flex;
    -webkit-box-flex: 1;
    -ms-flex: 1;
    flex: 1;
    -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
    -webkit-box-direction: normal;
    -ms-flex-direction: column;
    flex-direction: column;
    gap: 4px;
}

.tmpl_hh_office_card--white {
    display: -webkit-box;
    display: -ms-flexbox;
    display: flex;
    -ms-flex-wrap: wrap;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    -webkit-box-align: center;
    -ms-flex-align: center;
    align-items: center;
    -webkit-box-pack: start;
    -ms-flex-pack: start;
    justify-content: start;
    -ms-flex-wrap: nowrap;
    flex-wrap: nowrap;
    padding: 18px;
    border-radius: 20px;
    background-color: #fff;
}

.tmpl_hh_office_card--white img {
    max-width: 32px;

}

.tmpl_hh_office_card:not(.tmpl_hh_office_card--white) img {
    border-radius: 20px;
}

.tmpl_hh_office_card--row {
    -webkit-box-orient: horizontal;
    -webkit-box-direction: normal;
    -ms-flex-direction: row;
    flex-direction: row;
    gap: 4px;
}

.tmpl_hh_office_card--column {
    -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
    -webkit-box-direction: normal;
    -ms-flex-direction: column;
    flex-direction: column;
    -webkit-box-align: start;
    -ms-flex-align: start;
    align-items: start;
    -webkit-box-pack: justify;
    -ms-flex-pack: justify;
    justify-content: space-between;
    height: 100%;
    gap: 4px;
}

.tmpl_hh_office_card--mobile {
    display: none;
}

p.tmpl_hh_office_card_text {
    font-size: 10px;
    line-height: 1.2;
}

.tmpl_hh_waybill {
    margin: 0 8px 8px 8px;

}

p.tmpl_hh_waybill_title {

}

.tmpl_hh_waybill_rows {

}

.tmpl_hh_waybill_row {
    padding: 20px;

}

.tmpl_hh_waybill_row_wrapper {
    display: -webkit-box;
    display: -ms-flexbox;
    display: flex;
    -ms-flex-wrap: wrap;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    -webkit-box-align: center;
    -ms-flex-align: center;
    align-items: center;
    -webkit-box-pack: start;
    -ms-flex-pack: start;
    justify-content: start;
    -ms-flex-wrap: nowrap;
    flex-wrap: nowrap;

}

p.tmpl_hh_waybill_row_count {
    padding: 10px 20px;

    font-size: 11px;

}

p.tmpl_hh_waybill_row_count--black {

}

p.tmpl_hh_waybill_row_subtitle {

    border-radius: 24px;
    background-color: #ff5d2a;
    color: #fff;
    font-size: 11px;

}

}

    font-weight: 700;

p.tmpl_hh_waybill_row_text {
    font-size: 16px;

}

p.tmpl_hh_waybill_note {
    display: block;
    margin-top: 15px;
    padding-left: 20px;
    color: #b8b8b8;
    font-size: 12px;
    line-height: 1.2;
}

.tmpl_hh_footer {
    position: relative;
    min-height: 120px;
    padding: 30px;
    margin: 0 8px 8px 8px;
    border-radius: 32px;
    background-image: url("https://img.hhcdn.ru/ichameleon/449906.jpg");
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-size: cover;
    overflow: hidden;
}

.tmpl_hh_footer::before,
.tmpl_hh_footer::after {
    content: "";
    position: absolute;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-size: contain;
}

.tmpl_hh_footer::before {
    top: -48px;
    left: 0;
    width: 246px;
    height: 204px;
    background-image: url("https://img.hhcdn.ru/ichameleon/450086.png");
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
}

.tmpl_hh_footer::after {
    top: 9px;
    left: 25.5%;
    width: 97px;
    height: 95px;
    background-image: url("https://img.hhcdn.ru/ichameleon/449138.svg");
}

p.tmpl_hh_footer_title {
    padding-left: 48%;
    margin-bottom: 8px;
    color: #FFF;
    font-size: 20px;
    line-height: 1;
}

p.tmpl_hh_footer_subtitle {
    padding-left: 48%;
    color: #B8B8B8;
    font-size: 12px;
    line-height: 1.2;
}

@media (max-width: 1339px) {
    .tmpl_hh_office_card--white {

@media (max-width: 1019px) {

    }

    .tmpl_hh_office_card:not(.tmpl_hh_office_card--white) img {

    }

    .tmpl_hh_office_card--4 {

    .tmpl_hh_office_card--4 img {

        left: -329px;
        max-width: 705px;
        width: 705px;

    }

    img.tmpl_hh_head_car--2 {

        top: 94px;
        right: -157px;
        margin: 0;
    }

    p.tmpl_hh_head_subtitle {

    }

    p.tmpl_hh_head_text {

    }

    .tmpl_hh_benefits {

        padding-inline: 12px;
    }

    p.tmpl_hh_benefits_title {
        max-width: 100%;
        font-size: 24px;
    }

    .tmpl_hh_benefits_cards {
        gap: 3px 4px;
    }

    .tmpl_hh_benefits_card:nth-child(1) {

        -ms-flex-order: 1;
        order: 1;
    }

    .tmpl_hh_benefits_card:nth-child(5) {
        -webkit-box-ordinal-group: 3;
        -ms-flex-order: 2;
        order: 2;
    }

        order: 3;
    }

        order: 4;

        order: 5;
    }

    .tmpl_hh_benefits_card:nth-child(7) {

        -ms-flex-order: 6;
        order: 6;
    }

    .tmpl_hh_benefits_card:nth-child(6) {

        -ms-flex-order: 7;
        order: 7;
    }

    .tmpl_hh_benefits_card:nth-child(4) {

        -ms-flex-order: 8;
        order: 8;
    }

    .tmpl_hh_benefits_card:nth-child(9) {
        -webkit-box-ordinal-group: 10;
        -ms-flex-order: 9;
        order: 9;
    }

    .tmpl_hh_benefits_card:nth-child(10) {

        -ms-flex-order: 10;
        order: 10;
    }

    .tmpl_hh_benefits_card p {

    }

    .tmpl_hh_statistics {
        margin-bottom: 66px;
        padding-inline: 12px;

        max-width: 100%;

    }

    p.tmpl_hh_statistics_title br {

    }

    .tmpl_hh_statistics_cards {
        grid-template-columns: 1fr;
        gap: 27px;
    }

    .tmpl_hh_statistics_card {
        display: -webkit-box;
        display: -ms-flexbox;
        display: flex;
        -webkit-box-align: start;
        -ms-flex-align: start;
        align-items: start;
        gap: 39px;
    }

    .tmpl_hh_statistics_card:nth-child(1) {

    }

    .tmpl_hh_statistics_card:nth-child(3) {
        padding-left: 0;
    }

    .tmpl_hh_statistics_card:nth-child(3) p.tmpl_hh_statistics_text {

        padding-top: 28px;
    }

    p.tmpl_hh_statistics_card_title {
        font-size: 50px;
    }

    p.tmpl_hh_statistics_card_title::before {
        width: 80px;
    }

    .tmpl_hh_office {
        padding-inline: 12px;
    }

    p.tmpl_hh_office_title {
        padding-left: 0;
        font-size: 24px;
    }

    .tmpl_hh_office_cards {
        max-height: 100%;
        -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
        -webkit-box-direction: normal;
        -ms-flex-direction: column;
        flex-direction: column;
    }

    .tmpl_hh_office_cards::after {
        display: none;
    }

    .tmpl_hh_office_column {
        -webkit-box-orient: horizontal;
        -webkit-box-direction: normal;
        -ms-flex-direction: row;
        flex-direction: row;
    }

    .tmpl_hh_office_column--column-mobile {
        -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
        -webkit-box-direction: normal;
        -ms-flex-direction: column;
        flex-direction: column;
    }

    .tmpl_hh_office_card--white {
        padding: 18px;
    }
